title: The old poorhouse
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
On the island Falster I have (some of) my roots. My great grand dad was a stagecoach driver out of the village of Vaalse. I went to see the village and found a strange little community in a kind of time-pocket. This photo was made with an old camera, and I have been experimenting a bit PP. I believe the house on the photo to be the old Poorhouse. An a matter of interest, one can see the very rich soil of the area as it looks just after the autumn plowing. I like the photo for it's dreamlike atmosphere and the pov. 
ikeharel has marked this note useful
